name: week-4-propertybasedtesting
description: In the first half of this week, we will explore Property Based Testing (PBT), which is a form of unit testing. We will use two frameworks to assist us in this. The first one is *mocha*, a unit testing framework, which also integrates nicely with vscode. And building on top of this, we will use *fast-check* which allows us to write property based tests.
